CustomBehavior.Text:
WARNING: Previously completed quests detected! 

 Either you have done some of you quests already, and have restarted the bot...
 OR your cache folder is NOT clean, and must be deleted, and bot restarted.
Starting Cloud Serpent Dailies, moving to The Arboretum.
Starting The Trainer's Challenge: Ace Longpaw
If your CC is smart, and can interrupt frequently (and heal/soak well) you'll be all set. Otherwise do this manually. Press OK to let bot fight, or do it yourself, now.
Starting The Trainer's Challenge: Big Bao
If your CC is smart, and can interrupt frequently (and heal/soak well) you'll be all set. Otherwise do this manually. Press OK to let bot fight, or do it yourself, now.
Starting The Trainer's Challenge: Ningna Darkwheel
If your CC is smart, and can interrupt frequently (and heal/soak well) you'll be all set. Otherwise do this manually. Press OK to let bot fight, or do it yourself, now.
Starting The Trainer's Challenge: Suchi the Sweet
If your CC is smart, and can interrupt frequently (and heal/soak well) you'll be all set. Otherwise do this manually. Press OK to let bot fight, or do it yourself, now.
Starting The Trainer's Challenge: Qua-Ro Whitebrow
If your CC is smart, and can interrupt you'll be all set. This boss is not too tough, but the stacking debuff can hurt. Press OK to let bot fight, or do it yourself, now.
